Name: Suffering Bastard
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain ice-filled glass/mug charged with half the ginger beer. TOP with rest of ginger beer.
Review: Unusually combining gin and cognac, lengthened and spiced with ginger beer, this vintage classic was originally designed as a hangover cure.
History: Created in 1942 by Joe Scialom at the Shepheard's Hotel, Cairo, Egypt.
Nutrition: One serving of Suffering Bastard contains 199 calories
